Description: Pottery ostrakon: part of a letter from a son to his father, a serving soldier.
Curator's comments: For the text see Sijpesteijn 1973, no. 7 with further comments by Bagnall 1975, 140 and passim. Bibliography: Bagnall, R. 1975, 'The Roman garrison at Laptopolis', Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists 12/4, 135-144. Sijpesteijn, P.J. 1973, ‘Letters on ostraca’, Talanta V, 72-84.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Charles Ede Ltd (See sale catalogue, Writing and letter in antiquity XII (1988), no. 27c)
